text: House [[Kundarak]] operates the only bank in [[Sylbaran]], which it refers to internally as ''Stone 112''. It has a large, secure vault, but at the moment it isnâ€™t connected to the Kundarak vault network; the house continues to petition the town council for permission to establish such a connection. Following the common practice, House [[Sivis]] operates its [[speaking stone]] station from the bank and provides other scribing services.
title: Bank of Sylbaran
